Legal_Issue: Whether the visa officer correctly applied s. 78(4) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations in assessing educational credentials
Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, s. 78(4)
Evidence_Assessment: Marr's 11 years of education, two-year post-secondary credential, three-year apprenticeship, and Scottish education system differences
Decision_Outcome: Application refused due to insufficient points
Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to demonstrate eligibility and error in assessment
Legal_Rule: Section 78(4) allows points for special circumstances when required years of study are lacking but a qualifying credential is held
Procedural_Issue: Failure to consider special circumstances under s. 78(4); functus officio doctrine considered
Grounds_for_Claim: Officer erred in not applying s. 78(4) to account for shorter Scottish secondary education
Outcome_on_Merits: Officer's decision found to be in error
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Officer failed to properly consider relevant factors, leading to unfair assessment
Key_Evidence_Considered: Applicant's foreign education duration, post-secondary credential, apprenticeship, country-specific education structure
Legal_Framework: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Applicant_Challenge: Refusal of application based on incorrect point allocation
Court_Result: Decision set aside; remitted for redetermination by another officer within six months
Legal_Rule_Source: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, s. 78(4)
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence of education and training credentials
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of decision, redetermination of application
Remedy_Sought: Quashing of decision and re-assessment by immigration officer
Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial review followed by administrative reconsideration
Legal_Provision: s. 78(4), Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Legal_Provision_Cited: s. 78(4), Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Insufficient points under skilled worker selection criteria
Applicable_Process: Economic immigration application process with points-based assessment
Governing_Rule: s. 78(4), Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
